help-file.title: COSMOMANCER
help-file.content:
The ultimate and most devastating Ethermancer specializes in the long forgotten and near shunned arts of cosmocy, the ability the control the planets and satellites themselves. By following this course in specialization the ethermancer loses some of his more spiritual powers, trading those in for pure offense.
Spells --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 7th Circle : Cosmic Vacuum 8th Circle : Ethereal Discharge 9th Circle : Comet, Planetary Alignment 11th Circle : Supernova
